sentence.Network_en: In the wool - carpeted master bedroom, Nicholas's walnut table accompanies Kollar's linen - upholstered headboard.

sentence.Network_en: One evening I leaned against the headboard on Skyler's bed, arms around him.
sentence.Network_cn: 一天晚上,我靠在斯凯勒房间的床头板上, 双手环抱着他,他舒服地蜷缩在我两腿之间.

entry.def: A headboard is an upright board at the end of a bed where you lay your head.

means.word_mean: 1. a vertical board or panel forming the head of a bedstead
